item.description:
I will be at the theater by 6:30,  we will head in for seats around 7, showtime is 7:35 PM is just an estimate, I will update closer to the event, when actual film times become available.

The movie is showing upstairs, so I will grab a table by the big windows at the top of the escalator.   If you get there before me, please grab a table.

If you miss the group before hand, come find us after.  We gather outside the room where the movie was just shown to discuss the film, allow for restroom breaks and to get a head count of all those who want to go out after.

Release Date: April 22, 2011
Studio: 20th Century Fox
Director: Francis Lawrence
Screenwriter: Richard LaGravenese
Starring: Reese Witherspoon, Robert Pattinson, Christoph Waltz
Genre: Drama 

Plot Summary: During the Great Depression, Jacob, a penniless and recently-orphaned veterinary school student, parlays his expertise with animals into a job with a second-rate traveling circus. He falls in love with Marlena, one of the show's star performers, but their romance is complicated by Marlena's husband, the charismatic but unbalanced circus boss.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. If movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If it is showing downstairs, I will be by the ropes by the ticket takers until they let us in.
item.name: Water for Elephants
